root.heading: Comforts & Technology
root.text: While visiting our office, we know you will benefit from our many amenities that will make your appointment enjoyable. For your comfort, we offer nitrous oxide,laser systems including laser cavity detector, video imagery, touch screen computers, or relax in our adjustable chairs and enjoy television, movies or quality music. In addition, our infection control processes follow the most stringent standards for your safety and peace of mind.
